member.name: T:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction
member.summary: Represents a scheduled function that can be executed based on a condition.

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction},System.TimeProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction.LastRunDateTimeUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the last run date and time in UTC.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction.NextRunDateTimeUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the next run date and time in UTC.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction.Schedule
member.summary: Gets or sets the schedule for the cron function.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction.CronExpression
member.summary: Gets or sets the cron expression for the function. For guidance visit: https://crontab.guru/

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction.Logger
member.summary: Gets the logger for the cron function.

member.name: P:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction.TimeProvider
member.summary: Gets the time provider for the cron function.

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction.RunAsync
member.summary: Framework function to control CRON job execution. WARNING: ** It's not recommended that you override this function. **
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a boolean value indicating whether the function executed successfully.

member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Jobs.Cron.CronFunction.ExecuteAsync
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains a boolean value indicating whether the function executed successfully.
